name: Chimera the Flying Mythical Beast
text:
"Gazelle the King of Mythical Beasts" + "Berfomet"
(This card is always treated as a "Phantom Beast" card.)
When this card is destroyed: You can target 1 "Berfomet" or 1 "Gazelle the King of Mythical Beasts" in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target.
